description: Bernard Preynat, 74, is alleged to have assaulted dozens of Boy Scouts in the 1980s and 1990s.
title: Church sexual abuse: French priest Preynat admits 'caressing' boys
title_page: Church sexual abuse: French priest Preynat admits 'caressing' boys - BBC News
maintext: Appearing briefly at the court in Lyon on Monday, Mr Preynat said he was aware of the suffering he had already caused, and that he wanted the trial to "take place as quickly as possible".
